reviewText: The Shadow and the Flame is a movie for families to join together to watch.  Filled with action and a story-line about fighting monsters that is sure to entertain, viewers will enjoy the drama between good and evil.  Directed by a talented young man with an artistic eye, I hope we will be seeing more from Wes Latta in the years to come.

This movie is great!  A team of demon fighters led by a young boy learn forgiveness and where to find strength.  These young actors are pros and the music, special effects, and film quality far surpass most independent films out there.  It's a "must watch" for all ages.  We had some people over to watch it.  They laughed, cried, and cheered!
